name: Water Rises
description:
Keep a positive mindset and a positive population as you try to escape the rising sea by building an island village to the sky.

Controls:
LMB: Select/place building
RMB: Split building/pan camera
Mousewheel: Zoom camera/rotate building
WASD: Pan camera
ESC: Menu/options

Click once on a building card to select it and click a second time on the same building card to deselect it.
